case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_circumstances: On 10/02/2003 human remains, belonging to a Hispanic male adult in his 30s-40s, were found in the Ocotillo mountains, west of Ocotillo, California.  The route is commonly traveled  by illegal aliens.  A wallet containing pictures of children and a female were found near the remainings.  The name of "AVILA-TORRES" and possibly the word "RANA" were carved on the wallet.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_with_body: Levi Jeans 34x31 and a tan ostrich skin style belt size 38.  Tan cap from NIKE for the Lakers NBA basketball team.
case_footwear: "ESTABIO" ankle work boots, size 8.  White socks w/ blue toes and heal patches.
case_other_items_with_body: Wallet with possibly family pictures.  Also in the wallet there was a business card.  Please refer to attached pictures for further detail.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
